name: Phase Giant
description: The Phase Giant possesses exceptional strength and constitution, with spiky fists and the ability to shift between the Material and Ethereal Planes.
memorable: Its ability to phase shift grants it significant tactical advantages in combat, making it a formidable opponent.
goals: To maintain dominance on the battlefield and inflict heavy damage using both melee and ranged attacks.
relations: May be encountered alongside other giants or ethereal creatures.
environment: Often found in locations where the Material and Ethereal Planes are close together.
strengths: Possesses both high hit points and damage-dealing abilities, along with its unique phase shifting.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it less agile and potentially vulnerable to ranged attacks when not shifting to the Ethereal Plane.
attacks: Can make two powerful melee attacks with spiked fists or hurl rocks at targets from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: Ethereal Jaunt allows the giant to avoid physical attacks and reposition itself strategically.
senses: Passive Perception of 12 indicates moderate awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: The giant has excellent melee damage output due to high Strength.
Spiked fists can grapple opponents, inflicting additional damage.
The ability to knock foes prone with ranged rock attack enhances combat control.
